resources.string: Welcome to Android Auto Apps Downloader (AAAD). This utility will help install custom apps on Android Auto for non rooted phones. 11 App descriptions are available on long press.

The free version of AAAD allows you to have one free download each month. If you want to enjoy unlimited free downloads, you can switch to PRO version and you will enjoy full functionalities and app updates!
You are about to download %1$s. Do you wish to continue?

Payment processing is securely handled by Stripe Inc. AAAD does not collect or store your payment information. At the end of the payment, please manually press \"Return to merchant\" for the transaction to be validated.
Next download will be available on: %1$s

"AAAD (Android Auto Apps Downloader) is developed and mantained by Shmykelsa.

The available apps are made possible by the following developers:
"
Alternative to AAMirror with some more functionalities.
This app was made for allowing passengers to manage some functionalities in Android Auto. Requires the passenger to download AAPassenger. Working state is currently unknown.
A new web browser designed for Android Auto with Material 3 design, fullscreen video playback, and optimized automotive interface.
The most complete and full-featured mirroring app for Android Auto. Includes many features like a customizable launcher, split screen, custom screen sizes and much more!
The first and long-lasting screen mirror app for Android Auto. The ancestor of a family, AAMirror simply mirrors the screen of your phone to the car.
Another alternative to AAMirror with some extra functionalities. Recently revived and fixed for newer Android versions by Annexhack.

Formerly known as "YouTube Auto", CarStream was one of the first apps made with the custom apps SDK. It was born with the main purpose of delivering YouTube to Android Auto and then it became a web browser with many capabilities.

"The most complete video and audio player for Android Auto, featuring a full player experience with many features such as network streams and also a web browser. It also comes with the companion app Fermata Control that allows to manage the playback outside the app and from the controls on steering wheel."
You will be redirected to screen2auto website. From there, select the version and open with AAAD.
You are going to install Screen2Auto. Do you want to continue?
Born with one single task. Bring a widget to Android Auto!

This is a performance monitor, based on Martoreto\'s aa-stats. It\'s made specifically for use with the Volkswagen/Skoda/Seat/Audi MIB2 infotainment units, but it might also work on others, as long as they have Android Auto support. Needs also VAG extension to work on Volkswagen Cars.

AATorque brings the OBD-II vehicle diagnostics app Torque Pro to Android Auto. Monitor your car\'s performance, view diagnostic data, and access real-time vehicle information directly from your car\'s display.
You are eligible for a 15% off
This app is NOT affiliated with softonic.com, uptodown.com, or aadapk.com, aadapk.app. The only official source is github.com
This utility will help install custom apps on Android Auto for non rooted phones. Swipe through to learn how to use the app, then grant the required permissions to get started.
Select the app you want to install and wait for the system installer to come up.
If you are unsure about which app to install, long press the button to have a description.
Grant permissions to install custom apps
Required to install APK files from external sources
Get notified about download progress and app updates
Temporarily disable to allow custom app installation
Google Play Protect may block installation of custom apps. You need to temporarily disable it or allow AAAD when prompted.
Uses the system installer. Works for everyone. Shows installation prompts.
Silent installation without prompts. Requires one-time setup.
Shizuku installed - tap to start the service
Shizuku service is not running. Please open Shizuku and start the service.
Shizuku is a tool that allows apps to use system-level permissions via wireless debugging. It enables silent app installation on Android 14+ without root. You can still use AAAD without it!
Cannot open app - no launcher activity found
You need to upgrade to PRO or wait for your next free download.
Please connect to the internet to load app information and continue.
Could not retrieve the latest app information. Please check your internet connection and try again.
AAAD requires an internet connection to load app information. Please connect to WiFi or mobile data and try again.
You are offline - app data may be outdated
AAAD v%1$s is now available. You are using v%2$s.\n\nWould you like to download the latest version?
Update download failed. Please try manual download.
Install custom apps for your Android Auto experience

"The app has been made possible by the following libraries:
BottomDialog by iGio90
Stripe Payment Processing
"
This app respects your privacy. We do not collect, store, or share any personal information without your consent. For more information, please contact us.

With the new navigation apps coming into Android Auto, many of them lack of Google Assistant\'s support to navigate to addresses of contacts saved in the phone book. Nav2Contacts come to rescue! First, select the navigation app you want to use, then search the contact you want to navigate to and start the navigation right away!

Annexhack - Screen2Auto, AAStream
Andrey Pavlenko - Fermata Auto
Slashmax - AAMirror
Kiran Kumar, Eselter, Kristakos, Paesani2006 - Carstream
ns1306291 - Widgets For Android Auto
chillout - Performance Monitor for VAG
Martoreto - AAPassenger
FrankieNL - Nav2Contacts
PLEASE remember to press the blue button \"Return to merchant website\" after payment is complete
Do you want to send an e-mail for help right now?
I want to transfer license here
I want to transfer license from here
If you want to transfer the license from one phone to the other, you are in the right place. Please select what you want to do
Are you sure that you want to transfer the license to this device?
Great, now open the device that you want to transfer the license from and select \"I want to transfer the license from here\", then scan this QR code
You don\'t have an active license on this device
Show this QR code to transfer a license to this device
On the device with PRO, open AAAD and go to Transfer License
Tap the Scan QR Code button on that device
Scan this QR code to complete the transfer
Transfer your license to a new device
‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: Transferring your license will remove PRO status from this device and activate it on the new device. This action cannot be undone.
Open AAAD on your new device
A QR code will appear on the new device
Tap the button below and scan that QR code
Camera permission is required to scan QR codes
Failed to check license status. Please try again.
Failed to scan QR code. Please try again.
Are you sure you want to transfer your PRO license to the new device? This will remove PRO from this device.
Failed to transfer license. Please try again.
We are here to help you!
Having trouble with AAAD? Send us an email and we will get back to you as soon as possible. The more details you provide, the faster we can help!
Space for you to describe your issue
Recommended - Helps us troubleshoot faster. Contains device info and app configuration only, no personal data.
We respect your privacy. No personal information, passwords, or payment data is included in the logs.
Could not generate logs, sending email without attachment
Could not open email app. Please email help.aaad@gmail.com directly.
No email app installed. Please install an email app (Gmail, Outlook, etc.) or email help.aaad@gmail.com directly from another device.
Attachment not supported, sending email without logs
Could not attach logs, sending email without attachment
The camera permission is needed to scan a QR code
The e-mail will be used in order to verify your purchase, if needed
Less than 1 hour remaining until next download
Did the app installation complete successfully?
No, it failed or was cancelled
Installation verification timed out. Your download has been counted towards your monthly limit for security reasons.
Download was counted towards your monthly limit
Thank you for supporting AAAD with your PRO purchase! Your contribution helps keep this project alive and allows us to continue bringing you the best Android Auto apps.
We truly appreciate your trust and support. Enjoy your unlimited access to all AAAD apps!
